channel.title: Max Connections?
channel.description:
Rep++ give !!! Well in server.java i changed [code]public static int MaxConnections = 1;[/code] , but still in my server is like 20 people. Where is the problem?
Thanks

item.title: Max Connections?
item.dc:creator: @mati2 mati2
item.description:
@mati2 wrote:

[quote=“Baybee, post:7, topic:139728”]} if (Found < 20) { misc.println("ClientHandler: Accepted from "+connectingHost+":"+s.getPort()); playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); } else { s.close();

Try this maybe… Change the number 20 to 10 or 5?[/quote]
Dont work
